contents.text: Welcome to Addepar in South Bay, the first performance reporting platform that connects your financial goals with real world actionable insights.
For client support and account inquiries, press 1.
For technical assistance with the platform, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to technical support.

navigationGoals: Resolve a login issue preventing me from accessing my dashboard
I’m getting a loading error when I try to view my portfolio breakdown and need technical help resolving it.
Troubleshoot my REST API integration returning a 403 Forbidden error when requesting account data.
I forgot my password and need help logging into my account.
I need assistance resolving a data import error when uploading my portfolio CSV to Addepar.

contents.text: For billing, account updates, or statements, press 2.
Please hold while we transfer you to billing and account services.

navigationGoals: Update my payment method and retrieve my latest account statement
I need to update my mailing address on my monthly statement and clarify the fees from last billing cycle.
Retrieve last quarter’s subscription invoice PDF and update my payment card on file.
I’d like to understand a fee on my last statement and update my billing address.
I’d like to update my payment method and access my recent billing statement.

contents.text: For sales and new account services, press 2.
For product demonstrations and platform overviews, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our sales specialists for a demonstration.

navigationGoals: Arrange a concise demo of the platform’s core features for my team
I’d like a walkthrough of the platform’s dashboard features and how to set up performance alerts.
Schedule a technical demo of the portfolio analytics dashboard and API capabilities.
I want to schedule a simple demo to learn how the platform works.
I’d like to schedule a demonstration of the portfolio analytics features.

contents.text: For pricing, licensing, or contract inquiries, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our sales team for pricing details.

navigationGoals: Obtain a clear breakdown of pricing tiers and contract terms
I want details on subscription pricing and contract terms before upgrading my account plan.
Get a detailed breakdown of enterprise licensing tiers and per-user API call volume pricing.
I need information on pricing plans and licensing options.
Could you provide the licensing tiers and pricing details for an academic research account?
